Html:
Hi!

How can i zoom a svg file in c# project? I can open a file but don't know how to zoom it?

One more question, where can i display a svg file (on what c# component). Now i'am using picturebox and it works.

 

Sorry for bad english :)

Take a look at the SvgViewer project here for example of scaling / fitting of an image to a specific set of max height / width.

https://github.com/willowsystems/SVG-Rendering-Engine-dotNet
